XoLiLAnGeL213xO: woo hoo zeidman called me today to make sure my day went well. it didnt, but thanks for everything sean even gave me a little kiss on the cheek before school ended. everything that anyone did even a little smile, helped me :0) i dont want to make him feel like shit. what he did was totally his decision. right now i know it feels to be feeling MORE then shit, and i dont want him to feel that.. its bad enough having me have it, shouldnt he be happy that he doesnt have to worry then more then himself right now? yes, he is an asshole for dumping me, but honestly, it was his choice. thanks to EVERYONE and i mean EVERYONE who was there for me today, you hoenstly saved me.. stacy, niki, lexi, caitlin, justin, quinn, andrew, james, caitlin currin, kristine, garrett, killian, Jenny, Alex and other people.. ^^ why did i say this, the way he is acting is showing that he doesnt care.. why should i care then? it makes me weak thinking bout you, and what i should be doing is learning to make myself stronger and make myself know that i will get through this.. i will be ok. ((sooner or later)) ill get through this, right? edit you call me cuz "we're friends?" you call me more, now that we are friends more then you did when we went out! now i know why you are now "mr. in consistant, u havent even liked me for that long. thanks for everything, ass...

Post anything that you want, and post it anonymously. Anything. A story, a secret, a confession, a fear, a love - anything. Be sure to post anonymously and honestly. Post twice if you'd like. Then, put this in your LJ to see what your friends (and perhaps others who you don't even realize read your LJ) have to say.

i think the point of this flu is that is makes you feel like shit the first day, then you think your getting better the second and third day and then the fourth day, it hits you again.. damn disease!! i want to go back to school becuase it is ridiculous how i have nothing to do. bad thing- i cant do anything cuz i have absolutely no energy. nicetoknowyou712: whatsup? hows life TeXaS ShOrTy 69f: : / TeXaS ShOrTy 69f: good/bad TeXaS ShOrTy 69f: just that nicetoknowyou712: then why bad TeXaS ShOrTy 69f: I see half naked supermodels walking around skool all day TeXaS ShOrTy 69f: and im not popular enough to talk to em --mac, u dont make sence, but you made my day.. thank you!!! xoxo

well, i left school early today.. i hope everyone who is sick all feel better!! i sure hope i do! ive had some interesting conversations with a few people from when they got home from school.. alex and i talked bout guys, kevin and i were describing how we felt and what we sounded like when we reacted to our cold, emma and i were talking bout adam brody and the OC, and sarah and i were talking bout "her" ((hhaa)) and how sarah skipped school and is going blind cuz her pupals were dialated. im been extremely bored and ive though about all the things i can relate to when i talk, sneez, and cough. alex, thank u. youve made me relize how i feel bout friends and boyfriends. and i shouldnt just break things off with my friends cuz my boyfriend is jealous. andrew, if you read this, i feel soo awful and ive been soo stressed bout everything, and sorry for ending things becuase im messed up. please, can we just talk? i know that i go between like u and killian, but i can just clear up, things will be better... but maybe me being sick is a sign to make me think think and think.. ive relized that im going to regret everyday i took for granted in hating this school, and when the time comes where i start getting attatched to everyone, highschool is going to take everything away from me that ive grown up with, well atleast in my teen years. i never expressed myself on how much i love you guys.. without u guys, i truely dont know where i would be, so thank you for all you have done!! Well it's all so overrated In not saying how you feel So you end up watching chances fade And wondering what's real And I Give you just a little time I, Wonder if you realize I've been waiting till I see it in your eyes If I just breathe Let it fill the space between I'll know everything is alright Breathe, Every little piece of me You'll see Everything is alright If I just breathe Breathe

But it's like no matter what I do, I can't convince you, to just believe this is real So I let go, watching you, turn your back like you always do Face away and pretend that I'm not But I'll be here 'cause you're all that I got I cant feel the way i did before Dont turn you back on me I wont be ignored I am a little bit insecure a little unconfident Cause you don't understand I do what I can but sometimes I don't make sense I am what you never wanna say but I've never had a doubt It's like no matter what I do I can't convince you for once just to hear me out well- things are clearing up again. everyone saying that maybe a break would help us, obviously- no one knows us. the best thing about our relationship is that we work things out the way they truely need to be treated and they arent pushed aside by just taking "breaks" and just letting everything try to clear up. its just very hard when he doesnt take you serioulsy cuz you usually are very happy and non-worriable. well, things are cleared up and now i have relized that i wont be seeing alec out of school for another 2 weeks, and im just happy and truely lucky to have him in my class and let me chill with his friends.. it makes me feel important to know that he cares enough bout me to fit me into his life with his friends. --i brought my lovely throw away camera to school today, and by the end of lunch, i indeed had the throw it away without developing it cuz of SOME PERVS in the 8th grade... well hopefully CAITLIN will bring her pics tomorrow so i can decorate my binder over! well, i hope to get together with stace and the twins this weekend, i dont remember the last time i had a sleep over with them!! and im invited caitlin too. this will probably happen friday night cuz caitlin has church on sunday, well hopefully plans will work out! :-D

well,today was filled with magic! not.. nothing exciting happened. i hung out with caitlin, lexi, niki, stacy.. :-D im so glad i have them to make my life upbeat and i love how they make me laugh! stacy had a hard day, today, i think.. but everything is working out happily cuz she has us!! we had the magazine spy party before school ended. "the orange juice box splattered!" "SQUISSSHH, wwooa!!" it was great!! after school, i landed on hanging out with alex in burbank! we decied to go to see Honey. im soo happy that im hanging with alex, i missed her soo much and im glad that we are having this weekend! <3 alex is sucha crackup and its great watching us trying to make our phone messages. ggggrreattt timmmeess tonight!!! yee haw!! I am thinking it's a sign that the freckles in our eyes are mirror images and when we kiss they're perfectly aligned and I have to speculate that God himself did make us into corresponding shapes like puzzle pieces from the clay true, it may seem like a stretch, but its thoughts like this that catch my troubled head when you're away when I am missing you to death when you are out there on the road for several weeks of shows and when you scanthe radio, I hope this song will guide you home they will see us waving from such great heights, "come down now," they'll say but everything looks perfect from far away, "come down now," but we'll stay... I tried my best to leave this all on your machine but the persistent beat it sounded thin upon listening that frankly will not fly. you will hear the shrillest highs and lowest lows with the windows down when this is guiding you home

one more full day and im outta the school for a week.. o this week should be a HECK of a lot better then school. actully no, i would rather stay with my friends and teachers for the rest of the year studying bout stupid organisms, the colonial times, stupid idians in english and how to do the variable equations in math class. im soo sick of being home its not funny. people telling eachother" yes! one more day and NO SCHOOL!" no! dont leave me, let me come with all 75 of you and hang with you the rest of my life, dont make me go to my own house!!! anyway, today ALL DAY was test prep. considering the grades i got, im pretty happy that i had my friends sitting with me. we cold barely talk, but i liked having their prensence. it made me happy that i have them. #1 thing in my life before anything else including family, love and myself is my friends.. serioulsy, if one thing happend to any of them, i dont know what i would do. caitlin, stacy, niki, lexi, lindsay, katy, grace, brooklyn, sawah, amelia, shawna, alex z., alix, kaila, jenny theres a HECK of a lot more, but those are the ones in my head right now..
